snippet: The BBC and the Discovery Channel are essentially dissolving a relationship that dates to the 1990s.
abstract: BBC and Discovery Channel, who have collaborated on science and natural history programs since the 1990s, are dissolving their relationship.
lead_paragraph: The BBC and the Discovery Channel are essentially dissolving a relationship that dates to the 1990s.

headline.print_headline: BBC and Discovery Cut Back on Collaborations
headline.main: BBC and Discovery Cut Back on Collaborations
